Talk_0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Hey, I remember you. <sp:5:0:0>You're the reason
we're not still on the ground, groaning
and clutching our bellies.
I'll admit itâ€”throwing <clr:0000>Moblin guts <clr:ffff>into our
food was not one of my best ideas.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Instead, I should have used <clr:0000>monster
extract<clr:ffff>. That would've been delicious!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Maybe next time I'll try monster extract,
Hylian rice, and rock salt? Yeah, that
ought to work nicely...
Talk_0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You've gotta be well rested to push the
bounds of gourmet cooking!<sp:0:4:0>If you'll excuse me, I'm headed to bed.
Talk_0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't tell the others, but I've been staying
up late every night brewing my own
<clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0030: <sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>This will be perfectly edible. I think.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>...Hm?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01>I said you don't need to worry. I'm not
cooking with monster parts anymore!<sp:0:4:0>Yes, I may add a spritz of <clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>,
but what's the harm in that?
Talk_0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm the only one who cooks around here,
and sometimes, I'm at a loss for ideas.<sp:0:4:0>When that happens, I go to the <clr:0000>poster<clr:ffff> in
the stable for inspiration.
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Cooking is all about experimentation.<sp:5:0:0>
You can't let one failed recipe stop you
from trying again!
Talk_0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's about time for me to make dinner.<sp:0:4:0>Everyone's fussy about their food.<sp:5:1:0>
Sometimes it's a struggle to come up
with new recipes.
Talk_0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Why are you standing out in the rain?<sp:5:1:0>
I'm going to go get shelter.
Talk_0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Monster parts are used in <clr:0000>elixirs <clr:ffff>and, as
I learned the hard way, will spoil any food
you put them in.
<clr:0000>Monster extract<clr:ffff>, on the other hand,
can be added to most any dish, with
delicious results.
If you want to buy the stuff, you can
find it in <clr:0000>a village in the Akkala region<clr:ffff>
northeast of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I'm running out myself, so I should go
buy some too.<sp:0:4:0>It is pretty far away though.
Talk_0026:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>Geez. I put monster parts in the meat and rice bowl
one time, and I never hear the end of it.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You mean you haven't seen that poster
with pictures of ingredients drawn on it?<sp:0:4:0>That's a recipe. You'll find ones like it
posted in stables, villages, and other
places where folks mill about.
Just wait. Now that you know to look for
them, you'll start seeing them everywhere
you go.
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey. Hello... <sp:5:1:0>Or should I say
good evening?
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Don't tell the others, but I've been staying
up late every night brewing my own
<clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>What can I say? I'm dead set on using
monster parts in my cooking, one way
or another.<sp:0:4:0>Yes, I acknowledge that when I put
Moblin guts in the food, it didn't turn
out so well.<sp:0:4:0>By which I mean...made us grievously ill.
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>My friends are fussy about food, so
I know the struggle of coming up with
new recipes all too well.
Talk_0016: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hey. Too bad about this weather, huh?
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm in charge of making food.<sp:0:4:0>...What?<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Notice>Stop looking at me like that! I'm not
going to try adding monster parts again,
OK? I learned my lesson.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>And if a drop or two of <clr:0000>monster extract<clr:ffff>
made its way into the pot, would that be
so bad?
Talk_0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Monster parts are used in <clr:0000>elixirs <clr:ffff>and, as
I learned the hard way, will spoil any food
you put them in.
<clr:0000>Monster extract<clr:ffff>, on the other hand,
can be added to most any dish, with
delicious results!
If you want to buy the stuff, you can
find it in <clr:0000>a village in the Akkala region<clr:ffff>
northeast of here.
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>This looks like a tasty recipe. <sp:5:1:0>Now, what
are the ingredients? Bright-eyed crab and
Goron spice?
I should be able to catch bright-eyed
crab in a river.<sp:0:4:0>For Goron spice, though, I'd have to go
to <clr:0000>the general store in Goron City<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive>Well, now that Death Mountain stopped
erupting, Hylians can go there without
any protection against the heat.
Maybe I'll stock up when we go northeast.
